questions.question: which of this is a code injecting method used for attacking the database of a system / website.
This attack can be deployed by infusing a malicious code in a website’s comment section. What is “this” attack referred to here?
When there is an excessive amount of data flow, which the system cannot handle, _____ attack takes place.
Which of this is an example of physical hacking?
answers: Inserting malware loaded USB to a system
SQL Injection on SQL vulnerable site

questions.question: Which of this is an example of social hacking?
answers: Inserting a malicious link in a user’s browser
Inserting a malicious link in a user’s email
Inserting a malicious link in a user’s social media
Inserting a malicious link in a user’s search engine
